entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38457
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hot Reload does not work if body tag is incorrect #38454
  • Blazor WebAssembly crashes on mobile devices with low RAM #38452
  • Make IValueProvider async #38451
  • Img tags do not receive scope identifier in .Net 6 MVC Core #38450
  • UsePathBase being ignored #38448
  • Productize the custom elements support package #38447
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel Timeouts and Rates which are disabled under a debugger are undocumented #38446
  • Enable integration with 3rd party assets management solutions #38445
    .NET 7 Planning
  • problem converting a 3.1 core app to 6.0, routing is using more than 12-13 gig of ram #38444
  • Need to bring back cookie interop test coverage in some form #38443
    6.0.x
  • Optional parameter defaults in Controller Method are ignored. #38440
  • Virtualize scrolling is broken when using display:grid on panel and display:content on rows #38439
    Discussions
  • When using .net core 3.1 runtime with System.Text.Json 6.0.0 the serialization doesn't honor new API. #38438
  • Prevent ASP.NET Core SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38437
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .NET 6 Minimal API - WebApplicationFactory doesn't see custom settings json file values #38435
  • Cookies rejected while switching to minimal hosting model syntax #38434
    6.0.x
  • Blazor and .NET6 creates an error: EntrypointInvoker in assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly #38436
  • A type with name ... does not exist #38449
  • Blazor publish cannot access file because it's being compressed multiple times #38429
    Discussions
  • ScopedServices property of OwningComponentBase may not be disposed. #38424
  • Blazor action and function object type is not disposed. #38423

Closed

  • PageTitle Not Working with .Net 6.0 Blazor wasm project migrated from .Net 5.0 #38356
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Scaffold component with form or table for model class #32902
    Backlog
  • Code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36071
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `Ctrl +R` doesn't include renamed file in hot reload session #31728
    .NET 7 Planning
  • VS4Mac seems to be unreliable with dotnet-watch #34621
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [HotReload][BlazorWASM]: Adding an attribute to InputSelect results in a rude edit #36582
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Port WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies to 6.0.1xx #38220
    6.0.x
  • Blazor Wasm Azure AppService ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT ignored #28573
    6.0-docs-infra
  • dotnet run --project ignores launchsettings #38397
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor in production: can't find bindings module assembly: System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #38433
  • Change the log level for static web assets to Minimal #37779
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cannot validate service provider on default WebApplicationBuilder in ASP.NET Core 6.0 #38334
  • Blazor Components ILogger no longer receives class type. 5.0->6.0 #37887
  • ::deep Not Working in Blazor .NET 6 #38339
  • VS2022 Release Blazor calling my OnParametersSetAsync 4 times on the same control #38350
  • Allow developers to use Dependency Injection within components the same way DotNetCore does with everything else. #38385
  • Replacing dotnet.wasm #38401
  • CSS Isolation not works for nested CSS selector #38377
  • Resources built for razor library are not copied to publish folder #38374
  • Single file build time regression: proxy-yarp, proxy-yarp #37957
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, json, json #37956
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37868
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37805
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #37001
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, json, proxy-yarp #35629
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, proxy-yarp #32932
  • Single file build time improvement: json #32917
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, proxy-yarp, proxy-yarp #32916
  • Single file build time regression: json #32732
  • Single file build time improvement: json, json, json, plaintext #32717
  • Single file build time regression: json, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #32716
  • Single file build time regression: json #32669

PullRequests

Created

  • Try Ubuntu 21.10 #38456
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove remaining System.Net.Http 4.1.0 reference #38441
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21558.2 #38417
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Grant GitHub actions explicit permissions #38422
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Let VS Code do its thing #38388
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Grant GitHub actions explicit permissions #38421
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • [main] Grant GitHub actions explicit permissions #38420
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38412
    3.1.x
  • Update yarn.lock #38418
    area-blazor
  • Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38409

Updated

  • Override base implementations of WriteLineAsync in HttpResponseStreamWriter #38387
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-alpha1
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #38362
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
